name: Road Roller
overview: Cute clone of "Crush Roller" / "Make Trax" style games. A challenging game requiring speed, cunning, wits and strategy. Use your road roller to paint the roads purple making sure to avoid the ensuing ghouls. Paint the ends of the railway bridge and take the ghouls out. Meanwhile, rats and motorcars foul up your efforts. Squash them and clear up their tracks.
